title: How to Make a Lime Crush Smoothie

steps.headline: Chop and juice the apples.
steps.description: Pour the juice into the blender.

steps.headline: Prepare the banana and strawberries.
steps.description: Peel and cut the banana. Hull the strawberries and cut into slices.

steps.headline: Squeeze the juice from the lime into the blender.
steps.description: Add the strawberry and banana slices into the blender as well.

steps.headline: Blend everything for 30 seconds or until the drink is smooth.
Pour the mixture into a glass and serve.

text: Chop and juice the apples. Pour the juice into the blender. Prepare the banana and strawberries. Peel and cut the banana. Hull the strawberries and cut into slices. Squeeze the juice from the lime into the blender. Add the strawberry and banana slices into the blender as well. Blend everything for 30 seconds or until the drink is smooth.  Pour the mixture into a glass and serve.
